description:
So far I’ve been refusing the face mask😅 That means probably I will be fined tomorrow😂On the beach boulevard there are people who come up to you and remind you to wear one ... (apparently that is a job?!?🤯) They were both foreigners ... So I told them ... why again did you leave your own country? Maybe because your government wasn’t that good for you? They looked a bit shocked ...😏So I told them why in godsname are you enforcing this tyranny here then? And walked away😅In the old town everybody is wearing face masks ... and everybody stares at you because you don’t😂 Some people shake their heads ... And I just give my biggest smile😂So what can we do? We can all refuse ... the “Covid rules” .... We can just say no ... They can fine us ... but what if we all just don’t pay? Are they going to force us all? People really need to realize the power we have ... Maybe that’s all it takes .... Say no and move on with our lives....✌️

⁣ ⁣ ⁣
⁣ ⁣ ⁣ ⁣
⁣ ⁣ ⁣

#speakup #truthseeker #plandemic  #nonewnormal #freedom #lastnight #datelook  #summerday #poolday  #wwg1wga  #agenda2030 #golddress #saynotobillgates #scamdemic #zegneetegenanderhalvemeter #standthefuckup  #covid19 #rebelonaroll
